questions.question: Design a URL shortening service like bit.ly
questions.what_theyre_testing: System design fundamentals, scalability thinking, trade-off analysis, communication skills
questions.good_answer_structure: Start with clarifying requirements (reads vs writes, scale), design high-level components, discuss data model, address scalability (sharding, caching), and consider edge cases.

questions.question: Implement an LRU (Least Recently Used) cache
questions.what_theyre_testing: Data structures knowledge, algorithm design, code quality, optimization thinking
questions.good_answer_structure: Use a hash map + doubly linked list for O(1) get and put. Explain the approach before coding, handle edge cases, and discuss space/time complexity.

questions.question: How would you design an API rate limiter?
questions.what_theyre_testing: Distributed systems knowledge, algorithm design, understanding of production concerns
questions.good_answer_structure: Discuss token bucket or sliding window algorithms, distributed vs local limiting, storage (Redis), handling edge cases like time synchronization.

questions.question: A service is responding slowly. How would you diagnose and fix it?
questions.what_theyre_testing: Debugging approach, production experience, systematic thinking
questions.good_answer_structure: Check metrics (latency, CPU, memory), look at logs, trace requests, identify bottlenecks (DB, network, code), propose targeted fixes.
